column2: "Na abofra Samuel no soom EWURADZE wɔ Eli enyim. Na EWURADZE n’asɛm ho yɛɛ na wɔ nda no mu; nna enyido adzehu so mpo nntaa mmba."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ dabi
column3: Eli a nna n’enyiwa ahyɛ ase reyɛ nkusunkusu
column4: na onntum nnhu adze no da ne dan mu."

column2: "Nna Nyankopɔn ne fie kandzea no nnyae nndumii
column3: na Samuel so da EWURADZE n’asɔrdan no mu
column4: mbrɛ Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no wɔ no;"

column2: "na EWURADZE frɛɛ Samuel dɛ
"Na otuu mbirika kɔr Eli nkyɛn
column4: Emi nye yi; na efrɛɛ me. Na Eli buaa no dɛ
column5: Memmfrɛɛ wo; san kɛda. Na Samuel kɔree kɛdae."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kɔr do frɛɛ Samuel bio dɛ
column3: Samuel. Na Samuel soɛree kɔr Eli nkyɛn
column5: Emi nye yi; na efrɛɛ me. Na obuaa dɛ

column2: "Nna Samuel nnyae nnhun EWURADZE
column3: nkyii so wonnyae nnyii EWURADZE n’asɛm nnkyerɛɛ no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE frɛɛ Samuel bio ne mpɛn ebiasa. Na ɔsoɛree kɔr Eli nkyɛn na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Emi nye yi; na efrɛɛ me. Nna Eli hun dɛ EWURADZE na ɔrefrɛ abofra no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Eli see Samuel dɛ
column4: kɛda: na ɔba dɛ sɛ ɔfrɛ wo a
column8: na w’akowaa ritsie. Nna Samuel kɔree kɛdaa ne dabew."

column2: "Na EWURADZE bae begyinaa hɔ frɛɛ dɛ nkan no
"Na EWURADZE see Samuel dɛ
column4: merebɛyɛ adze bi wɔ Israel mu a obiara a ɔbɛtse no
column5: n’aso ebien nyina mu bɛyɛ no gyengyenngyen."

column2: "Da no na mebɛyɛ dza maka etsia Eli wɔ ne fi ho nyinara
column3: ofi ahyɛse ara dze kodu ewiei."

column2: "Na maka akyerɛ no dɛ mubobu ne fie atsɛn daa
column3: wɔ emumuyɛ no a ɔnoara nyim no ntsi
column4: osiandɛ ne mba twetwee mbusu baa hɔn do

column2: "Na dɛm ntsi mesua ketsee akyerɛ Eli fi dɛ
column3: wɔremmfa okum afɔr anaaso ayɛyɛdze mmpata Eli fie emumuyɛ no ara da."

column2: "Na Samuel dae ma adze kyee
column3: na obuebuee EWURADZE fie no mbobow no. Na Samuel suroo dɛ ɔbɛka enyido adzehu no akyerɛ Eli."

column2: "Na Eli frɛɛ Samuel see dɛ
"Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Ebɛn asɛm na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ wo no? Meserɛ wo
column4: mma mmfa nnsuma me: Nyankopɔn nyɛ wo dɛm
column6: sɛ edze nsɛm a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ wo no nyinara mu bi suma me a."

column2: "Na Samuel kaa ne nyinara kyerɛɛ no a ɔammfa no mu biara ennsuma no. Na Eli see dɛ
column3: ɔnoara nye EWURADZE: dza oye wɔ n’enyiwa do no

column2: "Na Samuel nyinii
column4: na ɔamma ne nsɛm no mu biara annyɛ atorsɛm."

column2: "Na Israel nyinara a ofi Dan araa dze kodu Beer-seba hun dɛ wɔahyɛ Samuel dzen dɛ ɔnyɛ EWURADZE no nkɔnhyɛnyi."
"Na EWURADZE yii noho edzi bio wɔ Siloh: nyew
column3: EWURADZE nam ɔnoara EWURADZE n’asɛm do na oyii noho edzi kyerɛɛ Samuel wɔ Siloh."
